name: quicklime production, milled, packed | quicklime, milled, packed | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8000/documentation

This dataset represents the packing of 1 kg of milled quicklime. The dataset is based on the module 'packing, lime products'.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

Packing process starting from milled quicklime, unpacked.

The activity ends with the product packed at the factory. The dataset includes the packing and the heating energy requirements for packing production and administration.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data is from only one company in Switzerland (KFN), with a production volume of 150'000t.

exchanges.description: Estimation, based on personal communication. Data corresponds to the Swiss company KFN for the year 2001.
